actions.name: Stomp
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (5d8+5) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 32 (6d8+5) bludgeoning damage.
